One trip's profit was 350,000 MNT. Because of his experience, he has many regular customers for this job. Now he requests a 1,000,000 MNT loan for his daughter's college tuition.

loans.use: To pay for his daughter's college tuition.

loans.name: Reymalyn

texts.en:
Reymalyn is from the village of Paddaya. She is 29 years old. She works hard to provide for her children's needs. She owns and operates a general store. The main source of her income is this business so she cares a lot for it. She has been engaged in her business for more than four years and earns approximately PHP 300 a day from it. 

Now, Reymalyn is requesting a loan of 15,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase candies, spices, noodles, sugar and coffee. She hopes that she will be able to earn a higher income and increase her capital. She aims to use the additional income generated from the business to improve their living situation and save for the education of her children.

loans.use: to purchase candies, spices, noodles, sugar and coffee.

loans.name: Juana

texts.en:
Juana is 63 years old and married with five children.

She works hard to provide for her family, running a general store in the Philippines. She has been running the store for 16 years and also earns an income from buying and selling rice and selling cell-phone credits.

Juana has requested a 22,000 Philippine peso (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell at her store. She has previously taken out and repaid 19 loans from NWTF. 

Juana hopes to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell.

loans.name: Salafai

texts.en:
Salafai is a 37-year-old married woman with four children. She makes and sells pancakes in her community to earn a living and has been doing this for a year. 

Salafai needs a loan to buy flour, sugar, baking powder, yeast, oil, a large cooking pot and a new cooking oven set. 

She plans to use her profits to improve her business and help with her kids' education. 

Salafai has been a member of SPBD since 2011.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and equipment to make pancakes to sell.

loans.name: Shirlene

texts.en:
Shirlene is 34 years old and married with three children. She lives with her family in a village and generates her income through dried fish vending. She aims to earn more income to provide for her family's needs and save for the future of her children.

Shirlene’s husband has tried to catch more fish in the river to increase her profits, but he has been unsuccessful. Therefore, she is requesting a loan for 12,000 PHP, which she will use to buy fish to dry and sell at a higher price. In this way, she will continuously generate income for her business. She believes that the loan will help her to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy fish to dry and sell.

loans.name: Magdaleno

texts.es: Magdaleno tiene 37 años de edad, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos en una colonia periférica de San Pedro Sula. El tiene 12 años de dedicarse a la venta de verduras, cítricos, legumbres y otros en un mercado local de la ciudad, vende limones, cilantro, cebolla, remolacha, pataste, zanahoria y otros. Anteriormente trabajaba en agricultura de granos básicos y café, pero necesitaba obtener más ingresos y opto por conseguir un puesto donde vender verduras. El préstamo que solicita es de 11,000 lempiras y lo utilizara en comprar más verduras para surtir el negocio y tener mayores ventas. Con esta inversión mantendrá disponibilidad para seguir invirtiendo y para cubrir gastos del hogar. En un futuro él quiere ahorrar para hacerle mejoras  a su casa.
texts.en:
Magdaleno is 37 years of age, and lives with his wife and three children in a neighborhood on the outskirts of Pedro Sula. For the past 12 years he has worked selling vegetables, citrus fruits, pulses and other items in a local market in the city. He sells lemons, cilantro, onion, beets, chayote, carrot and other products. He used to work farming basic grains and coffee, but as he needed to earn more income he decided to obtain a stall to sell vegetables. 

Magdaleno has requested a loan of 11,000 Honduran Lempiras, which he will use to buy more vegetables to supply his business and have higher sales. With this investment he will ensure availability to continue investing, as well as to cover the household expenses. In the future, Magdaleno would like to save to make improvements to his home.

loans.use: To buy vegetables, citrus fruits, pulses and other items to supply his business.

loans.name: Salele

texts.en: Salele is 32 years old and married with four children. She plans to start a business selling goods like snacks, soaps, flours, sugar, salt, rice, chickens, sausages, laundry powder, wash soaps, and soft drinks. She has requested a loan to buy bar soaps, cigarettes, matches, tin fish, and corned beef. Salele will use her profits to improve her kids' education and to improve her business and her family matters. She has been a member of SPBD since 2011.

loans.use: to buy bar soaps, cigarettes, matches, tin fish.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is 34 years old and married. She has two school-age children. She lives with her family in Paddaya and she operates a sari-sari (convenience) store business as a source of income. She has been doing this for five years. Rowena only earns PHP 5,000 every month, which is not enough for their expenses. 

Right now, Rowena is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase toothpaste, shampoo, canned goods, sweets and candies for her business. She hopes that she can get the amount she has requested in order to achieve higher proceeds to cover all their expenses.

loans.use: to purchase toothpaste, shampoo, canned goods, sweets and candies.

loans.name: Clarence`

texts.en:
Clarence is 48 years old and married with four children. For the last six years, she has built her own variety store business as a source of income.  She earns about PHP 250 per day. 

At present, Clarence wants to borrow a loan amount of PHP 8,000 in order to purchase soy sauce, cooking oil, sugar, coffee, vinegar and shampoo. She hopes that she can get the amount she has requested for further development of her business.

loans.use: to purchase soy sauce, cooking oil, sugar, coffee, vinegar and shampoo.

loans.name: Massavo 1 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MASSAVO 1 est formé de trois personnes qui sont des amies résidant dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Henriette est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Henriette est âgée de 30 ans et est mariée à un maçon du nom de Basile. Le couple a deux enfants dont un scolarisé et tous à leur charge. Henriette vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Le couple supporte ensemble les diverses charges du ménage. Henriette n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Il y a une quinzaine d’année environs que Henriette mène comme activité la vente des perles et des bijoux de façon ambulante. Henriette s’approvisionne dans au Nigéria. La demande de sa clientèle devient de plus en plus grande et compte tenu de ses moyens limités, Henriette n'arrive plus à bien répondre à leurs exigences. Eu égard à cela et compte tenu de leurs ressources limitées, Henriette et les autres membres du groupe MASSAVO 1 sollicitent ensemble un  premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The Massavo 1 group is composed of three people who are friends and live in the same area. The representative of the group, named Henriette, is the one whose hand is raised in the photo. This is the first time that the group has requested financial support from Alidé in order to increase their business.

Henriette is 30 years old and is married to a stonemason named Basile. The couple has two children under their care; one has been to school. Henriette lives together with her children and husband. The couple takes care of the household needs together. Henriette did not go to school.

Henriette has been in business selling beads and jewelry in markets for about 15 years. She gets her goods from Nigeria. Customer requests have been increasing, but because of limited resources Henriette has had a hard time meeting demand. Because of this Henriette with the other members of the Massavo 1 group are requesting this first loan from Alidé.

loans.use: to buy beads and jewelry

loans.name: Reyna Milagro

texts.es:
Reyna, tiene 35 años de edad, está casada, tiene dos hijos y vive en el municipio de la Masica Atlántida.
Tiene 3 años de dedicarse a la venta de ropa de segunda mano variada para damas, caballeros y niños. Las ventas las realiza de forma ambulante. Se transporta en su vehículo a puntos estratégicos y donde tiene sus clientes. Es un negocio rentable por ser barato. Ella está solicitando ya el tercer préstamo en ODEF y es por 6,000 lempiras, con este comprara un fardo de ropa más para surtir su inventario y poder cumplirles  a sus clientes. Su sueño es ver a sus hijos graduados y que se superen.
texts.en:
Reyna, 35, is married and has 2 children.  She lives in the municipality of Masica Atlantida.

For 3 years, she has had a business selling used clothing for men, women and children.  She sells from place to place; she transports her products to strategic places where she has customers.  This is a profitable business because the costs are low.  She is already requesting her 3rd loan from ODEF for 6,000 Honduran lempiras.  With it, she will buy another bale of clothing to stock up on merchandise so that she can satisfy her customers.  Her dream is to see her children graduate and succeed in life.

loans.use: to buy a bale of used clothing to sell

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
La  Señora Estela tiene 55 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo e hijos en una comunidad del Municipio de Choloma, Departamento de Cortés.
Hace 6 años que Doña Estela se dedica a la venta de zapatos y sandalias en su vivienda y de manera ambulante.
Ella se muestra satisfecha con la forma en que obtiene ingresos para contribuir a la economía del hogar.  Actualmente ha solicitado un préstamo por la cantidad de 6,000 Lempiras, los que piensa invertir en la compra de más producto para surtir su negocio.
Con la inversión que hará, ella espera satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, aumentar las ventas y mejorar sus ganancias para crecer económicamente.
texts.en:
Estela, 55, lives with her common-law husband and their children in a community in the municipality of Choloma, in the department of Cortes.

Estela has been selling shoes and sandals from her home and on the street for 6 years. She is satisfied with this way of earning income to contribute to the household finances.  She is currently requesting a loan of 6,000 Honduran lempiras, which she plans to invest in the purchase of more products for her business.  

With the investment she will make Estela hopes to satisfy the demands of her customers, increase her sales, and improve her earnings so that she can have economic growth.

loans.use: to stock up on more products for her business selling shoes and sandals

loans.name: Carlos Antonio

texts.es: Carlos 58 años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida quien se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar.  Carlos posee una finca en la que se dedica a sembrar frijoles, maíz, guineo y cocos, lo que posteriormente comercializa. Desde hace más de 20 años que él trabaja de esta manera, por lo que desea darle una mejora al negocio.  Carlos solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar abono para el fortalecimiento de su cosecha, así mismo desea invertir en la reparación de los cercos de su finca, con esto podrá mejorar en gran manera las condiciones de su negocio lo cual había sido casi imposible por falta de recursos pero que gracias al préstamo otorgado por INTEGRAL podrá realizarlo.
texts.en:
Carlos is 58 years old and lives with his wife who looks after the home. He owns a small farm where he grows beans, maize, quinoa, and cocoa, which he then sells. He’s been doing this work for more than twenty years and he now wishes to make some improvements to the business.

Carlos is seeking a loan so that he can buy fertilizer to improve production. He also wishes to repair the fences around his farm and in this way greatly improve it, something that has been almost impossible to do because of lack of money. He is grateful that with this loan from INTEGRAL he will be able to do this.

loans.use: buy fertilizer for his crops

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es:
El Señor Gregorio tiene 55 años de edad, está casado, tiene un hijo y reside en una comunidad rural del Municipio de Tela, Departamento de Atlántida.
Don Gregorio se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 8 años, produciendo hortalizas como pepino, chile, melón, plátano y maíz. Para dedicarse a esta actividad, Don Gregorio alquila terreno en cada ciclo de los cultvos.
Ha solicitado un préstamo por la cantidad de 10,000 Lempiras los cuales piensa invertir en la compra de fertilizantes, herbicidas y pago de mano de obra.
Don Gregorio se muestra optimista con su actividad de generación de ingreso, él tiene como meta seguir cultivando para comprar su propio terrero con sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Gregorio, age 55, is married and has a son.  He lives in a rural community in the Tela municipality in the Atlántida department.

Gregorio has been farming for eight years.  He produces fruits and vegetables like cucumber, hot peppers, melon, bananas, and corn.  In order to do this business activity Gregorio rents land each crop cycle.

He has requested a loan for 10,000 lempiras to buy fertilizers and herbicides and to pay for labor.  Gregorio is optimistic about generating income with his business activity.  His goal is to continue cultivating in order to buy his own land with his earnings.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicide.

loans.name: Dilia Danery

texts.es:
La  Señora Dilia tiene 38 años de edad, está casada, reside en  el Municipio de Las Vegas, Departamento de Santa Bárbara en compañía de su esposo e hijos.
Desde hace 4 años inicio su negocio a través de una tienda de comestibles donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar como: granos básicos, carnes, pan, medicamentos, churros, refrescos y productos de higiene.
Doña Dilia ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por la cantidad de 23,000 Lempiras con el propósito de surtir su tienda y ofrecer mayor y mejor variedad de productos.
Con esta inversión espera un incremento en sus ventas e ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dilia is 38 years of age, married, and lives in the town of Las Vegas in the department of Santa Bárbara with her husband and children. Four years ago she started up her business, a small food store where she sells basic items such as basic grains, meat, bread, medication, churros, soft drinks and hygiene products.

Dilia has decided to request a loan of 23,000 Honduran Lempiras to supply her store, therefore offering a greater and better variety of products. With this investment she hopes to see an increase in sales and income, as well as to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: To buy food products.

loans.name: Rosa Miriam

texts.es: Rosa Miriam de 58 años de edad, es una persona muy conocida en su lugar de habitación por ser muy trabajadora y responsable con su familia. Ella es madre soltera y vive junto a dos hijas las cuales le ayudan con los gastos del hogar. Rosa trabaja comercializando productos medicinales y nutricionales los cuales comercializa en su hogar, y así mismo los vende de forma ambulante en distintos cantones donde cuenta con varios clientes fijos que consumen sus productos a diario. Rosa desea mucho salir adelante y contar con una vida mejor para sus hijas y para ella por lo que solicita un préstamo para contar con el dinero necesario para la compra de mayor cantidad de productos los cuales son de muy buena reputación por lo que se venden muy bien, lo que desea aprovechar al máximo.
texts.en:
58-year old Rosa Miriam is well-known for being very hardworking and responsible towards her family. She is a single mother and lives with her two daughters who help pay for household expenses. Rosa earns her living selling medicinal and nutritional medicines from her home and also in the streets of different cantons. She has a regular clientele who take the products on a daily basis. 

Rosa very much wants to get ahead and make a better life for herself and her daughters so she is seeking a loan so she can afford to buy the medicines in larger quantities. The products have a very good reputation and will sell well, a situation she will make the most of.

loans.use: buy medicinal and nutritional medicines

loans.name: Rebeca Ester

texts.es: Rebeca Ester de 26 años de edad vive junto a su esposo y una hija por quien ambos trabajan muy duro para darle lo mejor. Rebeca posee una tienda de productos de primera necesidad como: harina, huevos, pastas, leche y también golosinas, su negocio es muy estable ya que cuenta con varios años de tenerlo, razón por la cual también es muy conocida en la zona y tiene varios clientes. Rebeca solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder surtir la tienda con mayor cantidad de productos como: jabones, lejías, diferentes tipos de bebidas y más, y de esta forma aumentar sus ventas, lo cual es una de las principales razones de dicho préstamo, ya que de esta forma ella podrá vivir mejor junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Rebeca Ester is 26 years of age, and lives with her husband and one daughter. The couple works very hard to give their daughter the best. Rebeca has a store where she sells basic products such as flour, eggs, pasta, milk and candies. Her business is very stable as she has had it for a number of years, and this is why she is very well-known in the area and has numerous customers. 

Rebeca has requested a loan from Integral, so that she can supply her store with a greater quantity of products such as soaps, bleaches, different types of drinks and other items. In this way she will be able to increase her sales, one of the main reasons for requesting this loan, as it will allow her to have a better life alongside her family.

loans.use: To buy basic goods to supply her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more clothing

loans.name: Duterimbere/kzr Group

texts.fr:
Monsieur Zachée est le membre et le président du groupe Duterimbere / Kzr. Le nom du groupe signifie «Développer notre groupe».Il a 38 ans et il est marié avec 5 enfants de 3 mois à 13 ans, dont 3 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est de 6 ans de primaire.

Zachée est cultivateur de riz. C’est son troisième  cycle de prêt avec ACB et il dit que le crédit antérieur a aidé ses activités de l’agriculture de riz beaucoup et il n’a pas attendue aucunes difficultés de non remboursement du crédit. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des fertilisants et payer la main d’œuvre pour son activité d’agriculture de riz. 

Pour accroitre son agriculture du riz, il planifie de demander d’autres prêt pour augmenter la capacité de ses activités de la culture de riz. Dans les prochaines années, il voudrait être le meilleur producteur de riz dans la région. Avec les profits, il prévoit de payer le frais scolaire et médicaux de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Zachée is a member of the Duterimbere/Kzr group and is also its president. The name of the group means "Develop our group". He is 38 years old and married with five children ranging from three months to 13 years of age, three of whom attend school. He himself has six years of primary school education. 

Zachée is a rice farmer. This is his third loan cycle with ACB, and he says that his previous loan helped him significantly with his rice farming activity and that he had no problem in repaying the loan. He is going to use his loan to buy fertilizers and pay for labor. In order to expand his rice farming business he plans to ask for further loans. In the coming years, Zachée would like to be the foremost rice farmer in his region. He is planning to use the profit he makes to pay for his children's schooling and health costs.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizer and pay for labor.

loans.name: Cornilla

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Cornilla works hard to support her family.

She has a dried fish business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from weaving native baskets. Cornilla is borrowing 30,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy dried fish to sell for her dried fish business.

Cornilla has been sustaining her business activities through her past 13 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy dried fish to sell for her business.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 34 years old and has five children. Evelyn is married and has four children in school.

Evelyn is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. Evelyn requested a 12,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Evelyn has been farming rice for seven years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Evelyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Felicidad

texts.en:
Felicidad works hard to support her family. Felicidad is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

Felicidad requested a 20,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy fishnet for her fishing business.

Felicidad has been in this business for 25 years now.

In the future, Felicidad would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishnet for her fishing business.

loans.name: Faalua

texts.en:
Faalua is a 20-year-old married woman with two children. She makes and sells pancakes in her community to earn a living. She has a year of experience with this business.

Faalua needs a loan to buy flour, oil, a large fry pan, a new cooking oven, a large tin bowl and plastic papers. She plans to use her profits to improve her business and her kids' educations. Faalua has been a member of SPBD since 2012.

loans.use: to buy flour, oil, a large fry pan, a new cooking oven, a large tin bowl and plastic papers.

loans.name: Asc  Diamo Group

texts.fr: L'ASC DIAMO est une association culturelle et sportive qui a en son sein une équipe de football.Cette année, l'ASC a décidé de cultiver un champs collectif pour ses socétaires.Chaque membre a son lopin de terre qu'il exploite.Cette activité leur permet de subvenir à leurs besoins mais aussi aux besoins de leurs familles respectivees.Le responsable de l'équipe (en tenue de ville) est un homme marié.Il a en charge son épouse et ses trois enfants notamment leur nourriture, leurs frais de scolarité et de santé.L'ASC sollicite un pret de 1 278 400 f pour acheter des semences et des engrais.Leur ambition est d'élargir l'activité.
texts.en: ASC Diamo is a cultural and sports association, within which there is a football team. This year the ASC decided to farm a collective field for its member/shareholders. Each member has his own plot of land which he farms. This activity allows them to provide for their needs as well as those of their respective families. The man in charge of the team (dressed in smart clothes) is a married man. He takes care of his wife and three children, in particular providing for their food, school fees and health costs. The ASC is requesting a loan of 1,278,400 francs to buy seeds and fertilizers. Their ambition is to expand their activity.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Claudia Emérita

texts.es: Claudia Emérita de treinta y tres años de edad vive junto a sus hijos, ella posee un comedor y sirve platillos en variedad pollo, carne asada, arroz, ensaladas, sopas, frijoles, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y ya tiene mucha experiencia en la cocina sus comidas son las mas deliciosas de la zona, tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque siempre están elaboradas con material de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además de un excelente servicio; Claudia es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, quiere ganarse un futuro mas prospero y trabajara duro hasta lograr su objetivo, como toda buena comerciante quiere acrecentar el negocio por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar carnes, verduras, granos básicos, lácteos, bebidas etc. Claudia Emérita tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Claudia Emérita, age 33, lives with her children.  She has a restaurant, and she serves a variety of dishes like chicken, grilled meat, rice, salads, soups, and beans, among others.  She has had the business for several years.  

She now has a lot of experience in the kitchen, and her food is the most delicious in the area.  She has a lot of clientele.  People prefer her because her food is always made with first quality ingredients at reasonable prices.  She also provides excellent service.

Claudia is an enterprising woman with a great desire to get ahead.  She wants to achieve a more prosperous future, and she will work hard until she achieves her objective.  Like all good merchants, she wants to grow her business.

That is why she is requesting a loan from Integral.  She will use the loan to buy meat, vegetables, basic grains, dairy products, and drinks, etc.  Claudia Emérita has good payment references, and she is very responsible.  She affirms that she will repay the loan, and she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, basic grains, dairy products, and drinks.

loans.name: Antonio Cesar

texts.es: Antonio Cesar de 39 años de edad, vive junto a su compañera de vida quien le ayuda en el negocio que posee, la cual es la única fuente de ingreso con la que cuentan. Antonio trabaja comercializando relojes de diferentes marcas, estilos, colores y precios, así mismo vende brazaletes, baterías, pin para relojes, lentes y otros accesorios más. Su trabajo es muy duro ya que debe ir de colonia en colonia vendiendo de forma ambulante sus productos, lo que es bastante difícil sobretodo en la temporada de lluvia, situación la cual no le impide trabajar por el bien de su hogar. Él solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor variedad de relojes con lo que él espera mejorar su venta y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Antonio Cesar is 39 years of age, and lives with his life partner who helps him with his business. This business is the only source of income the couple has. Antonio Cesar works selling watches of various brands, styles, color and prices, as well as bracelets, batteries, watch pins, glasses and other accessories. His work is very hard, as he has to travel from neighborhood to neighborhood selling his products on the street. This is difficult, particularly during the rainy season, although he keeps on working to provide for his household.

Antonio Cesar has requested a loan from Integral. He plans to use this money to buy a greater variety of watches, with which he hopes to improve his sales and have a higher income.

loans.use: To buy watches for sale.

loans.name: Roselita

texts.en:
Roselita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a firewood/charcoal retail business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 19,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell to her customers.

NWTF is listing Roselita's business profile again in support of her latest efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a clothing sales business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

NWTF is relisting Janet's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of clothing to sell to customers.

loans.name: Sherwin

texts.en:
At age 29, Sherwin has already been blessed with one child. All he wants is to provide him a good education and employment someday. Sherwin and his spouse untiringly generate income for the family. 

He provides motorcycle transport services to the people in their village. He would like to provide maintenance for their motorcycle unit so that he will continuously provide safe travel for the passengers. In this matter, he is now asking for additional capital of PHP 10,000 to buy new pairs of tires and crude oil for the motorcycle. In the future, Sherwin would like to improve their earnings for the overall welfare of the family.

loans.use: to buy new pairs of tires and crude oil for the motorcycle.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
This is Virginia, She previously accessed an 8,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase merchaandise needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in their personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for a 15,000 PHP loan to buy ready-to-wear products and merchandise items needed in her business. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her family’s daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Virginia hopes to be able to expand her business in the coming years. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for merchandise to sell in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay the labor costs for his rice-growing business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw material in order to sell handicrafts.

loans.name: Marifel

texts.en:
As a married mother of eight children, Marifel works hard to support her family.

She has a firewood sales business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from pig fattening.  Marifel is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to buy more firewood to sell.

Marifel has been sustaining her business activities through her past 13 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more firewood to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is 41 years old and married. She has four children.

Juliet is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Juliet requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Juliet has been raising pigs for 10 years now, and has borrowed 28 times in the past from NWTF and, more recently, from Kiva to sustain it.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Ramata

texts.fr: Mademoiselle Ramata  vit dans une des localités de la banlieue  sénégalaise. Elle est employée de maison et en meme temps pratique l’activité de commerce depuis 2 ans. Elle est membre du guichet de l’UIMCEC de sa zone d’habitation. Les revenus que lui procure son activité lui permettent de participer  aux charges familiales. Elle a déjà remboursé 2 prêts antérieurs  et  sollicite un crédit de 400 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de tissus et produits alimentaires  a revendre en vue de développer son activité de commerce et renforcer ses gains financiers.
texts.en:
Ramata lives in a town located in a Senegalese suburb. She is a domestic assistant, and has also worked in retail for the past two years. She is also a member of the UIMCEC branch in her area.

The income that Ramata earns from her business allows her to pay her share of the family expenses. She has already repaid her two previous loans, and has requested a loan of 400,000 francs. She plans to use the money to buy fabrics and food products for resale, so that she can develop her retail business and have more financial income.

loans.use: To buy fabrics for resale.

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.en:
Alfonso is a hardworking father who lives at Furagui with his wife and three children. 

He has been providing a transport service for three years now. He is borrowing a loan of PHP 8,000 to maintain his business. He would like to keep providing safe travel so he can save income for his children's education. From his loan, he will buy gasoline and crude oil used in his transportation business. 

Someday, Alfonso hopes to save enough to buy hogs to raise that would increase their income. It will help alleviate his family from their poor living conditions.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and crude oil used in his transportation business.

loans.name: Luciana

texts.en:
Luciana is 55 years old and married. She has seven children.

Luciana works hard to provide for her family. She sells ice and other frozen products in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials and stocks to sell.

Luciana has borrowed and paid 15 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the ice and other frozen products retail for 10 years and also earns an income from electronic re-loading.

Luciana aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials and stock to sell.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is 51 years old and married. She has three children.

Delia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc., in her general store.

Delia has borrowed and paid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from selling ready-to-wear clothes.

Delia aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 40 years old and single. She is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Gina has been raising pigs for three years now and has borrowed nine times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Gina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is 31 years old and married. She has three children.

She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines. Elsie is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to buy additional feed and vitamins for her livestock.

Elsie has been raising livestock for two years.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional feed and vitamins for her livestock.

loans.name: Mwinyi

texts.en:
Mwinyi is a 30-year-old married man and father of three children, who he takes good care of. Three years ago, Mwinyi opened his present barber shop serving the vicinity of Tiribe. He has experience in this field with a very good reputation. This long experience has helped him gain customer's trust and support.

To improve his business, Mwinyi applied for a loan from Kiva partner Yehu in order to improve his shop by buying more shaving machines and chemicals. Through this loan he will be capable of increasing his income and improving in order to please his customers.

loans.use: to buy more shaving machines and chemicals.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
This is Nenita. She received a previous 30,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase a greater quantity and variety of grocery items and products needed in her general store. Her earnings were a big help for her children’s education and for her personal, household, and business expenditures. 

Nenita is requesting another 50,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages, and other products to add to her store inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better. Nenita knows that more items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from her loan will definitely help to sustain her family’s daily needs and provide for her children’s education. Nenita looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. She hopes to grow her business and she dreams of being able to give her children a good, high quality education. Nenita faithfully meets up weekly with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and draw strength and inspiration from studying the Word of God. 

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners who gather to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and products for her general store

loans.name: Jovita

texts.en:
Jovita is 45 years old and married with four children. For the past six years, she has been running a general store in the Philippines and she also earns an income from selling livestock, raising pigs, and farming sugarcane. Jovita has borrowed and repaid two previous loans from NWTF. She works hard to provide for her family. 

Jovita is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional stock for her general store. She aspires to save enough money to afford to send her four children to college.

loans.use: to buy stock for her general store

loans.name: Magdalina

texts.en:
Magdalina is a hardworking entrepreneur who has been selling legumes and vegetables in the Philippines for the past 33 years. She has been sustaining her business through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF.  

Magdalina is requesting a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of legumes for her business. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase legumes to sell

loans.name: Ousmane

texts.fr:
Ousmane est un homme marié.Il exploite depuis plusieurs années des terres qu'il a hérité de ses parents.Il cultive du mil et de l'arachide.Une partie de la production est destinée à la consommation alors que l'autre partie est vendue sur le marché.Cela lui permet d'obtenir des revenus qui lui permettent de prendre en charge ses propres besoins ainsi que les dépenses d'entretien de sa famille.

Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, il sollicite un pret de 300 000f pour acheter des engrais et des semences.

Son ambition est de renforcer son activité.
texts.en:
Ousmane is a married man. For several years he has been farming land that he inherited from his parents. He farms mil and groundnuts. Part of the output is destined for consumption while the other part is sold on the market. This allows him to obtain revenue which allows him to take care of his own needs as well as the maintenance costs for his family. 

In order to strengthen his business, he is requesting a loan of 300,000 f to buy fertilizers and seeds. 

His goal is to strengthen his business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is 40 years old and married with four children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy stock to sell in her general store.

Emily has borrowed and paid 13 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Emily aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy stock to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Javlon

texts.en:
Javlon is a hardworking man and lives in a house which is in bad condition. He is a divorcé and is raising two children alone. His children would like to live in a house in good condition, but his income from animal husbandry is not enough for it. He must repair the roof of his house.

Javlon is asking for a loan of 5500 TJS to repair his house. In this way he will be able to offer his family a better quality of life and stability, which will allow them to progress. He is requesting your support and mercy to help his family. He will make his payments on time every month.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as wood, bricks and cement to repair his house.

loans.name: Martisa

texts.en: Martisa is a hardworking entrepreneur who runs a ice-cream-making business in the Philippines. She is requesting a loan for PHP 13,000 from NWTF to buy the ingredients she needs to make more ice cream. She has been in this business for two years and earns additional income by selling vegetables. Martisa has sustained her business through her own efforts and with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make more ice cream.

loans.name: Alain Noel

texts.fr: Monsieur Alain Noël réside au Sénégal. Il est célibataire et s’active depuis 12 ans dans la menuiserie. Elle commence chaque jour ses activités  9 heures le matin pour descendre a 18 heures dans l’après midi. Il est membre d’un des guichets de l’UIMCEC ou il a déjà remboursé 2 prêts antérieurs. Il sollicite un crédit de 500 000 frs prévu pour la fabrication d’une chambre a coucher et quelques meubles  qui seront destinés a la vente.son objectif est d’accroitre les revenus qu’il gagne a travers son activité.
texts.en:
Alain Noël lives in Senegal, is single, and has worked as a carpenter for 12 years. He starts work every morning at 9 am, and finishes at 6 pm. He is a member of one of the UIMCEC branches, and has already repaid his two previous loans. 

Alain Noël has requested a loan of 500,000 francs, which he plans to use to make a bedroom as well as several pieces of furniture which he will sell. His plan is to increase the income he earns through his business.

loans.use: To make furniture for sale.

loans.name: Ninfa

texts.en: As the married parent of four children, Ninfa works hard to support her family. She earns a living by selling food in the Philippines, and earns additional income by raising livestock. Ninfa is requesting a loan for PHP 18,000 through NWTF to buy the ingredients she needs to make more food to sell to her customers. Ninfa has sustained her business through nine previous loans from NWTF. She hopes that hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients for her food-making business

loans.name: Madelyn

texts.en:
Madelyn is 32 years old and married with two children.

Madelyn works hard to provide for her family. She buys and resells rice in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy sacks of rice to sell.

Madelyn has borrowed and repaid one loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running her rice business for 25 years and also earns an income from buying and selling fish.

Madelyn aspires to save money and to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Norma

texts.en: Norma is 45 years old, married and the mother of six children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines, and is requesting a loan for PHP 12,000 from NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her livestock. She has been in this business for two years and earns additional income by selling vegetables. She is working tirelessly to attain her dream: to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy food and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Sainte Bernadette Group

texts.fr: Le groupe SAINTE BERNADETTE est formé de quatre personnes qui sont des amies appartenant à un même groupe de tontine. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Médédjigbé Honorine est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Médédjigbé Honorine est âgée de 58 ans et est mariée à un certain Norbert. Le couple a trois enfants dont certains scolarisés et un à leur charge. Médédjigbé Honorine vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Le couple supporte ensemble les diverses charges du ménage. Médédjigbé Honorine a peu fréquenté l'école. Il y a une trentaine d’année environs que Médédjigbé Honorine mène comme activité la vente des boissons et de divers articles (huile végétale...) à son domicile. Médédjigbé Honorine s’approvisionne dans une ville du Bénin et dans sa région. La demande de sa clientèle devient de plus en plus grande et compte tenu de ses moyens limités, Médédjigbé Honorine n'arrive plus à bien répondre à leurs exigences. Eu égard à cela et compte tenu de leurs ressources limitées, Médédjigbé Honorine et les autres membres du groupe SAINTE BERNADETTE sollicitent ensemble un  premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The Sainte Bernadette group has four female members, who are all friends and belong to the same savings group. The group’s representative is called Médédjigbé Honorine, and is pictured with her hand raised in the photo. This is the first time that this group has requested financial support from Alidé, and they have done so to increase their business levels. 

Médédjigbé Honorine is 58 years of age, and is married to a man named Norbert. The couple has three children, one of whom is dependent on them and some of whom are at school. Médédjigbé Honorine lives with her husband and children, and the couple make sure that the various household expenses are met. 

Médédjigbé Honorine did not spend much time at school, and for about 30 years she has worked selling drinks and various articles (vegetable oil) from home. She gets her supplies from a town in Benin and in her region. Customer demand is growing more and more and, given her limited resources, Médédjigbé Honorine cannot meet their demands. In light of this, and given her reduced means, she and the other members of the Sainte Bernadette group have requested their first loan from Alidé together.

loans.use: To buy drinks and various articles.

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en: Rosie is married and the 43-year-old mother of five children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur who earns a living by selling food in the Philippines. She is requesting a loan for PHP 25,000 from NWTF to buy the ingredients she needs to make more food to sell to her customers. Rosie has been in this business for 15 years and would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make more food to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Haydar

texts.ru:
Хайдар проживает в городе Исфара. Он женат. Ему 28 лет. У него один ребенок. Жена Хайдара домохозяйка. 
Хайдар занимается разведением  мелко – рогатого скота. В этой области он 12 лет. Последние пять лет Хайдар совмещает работу электриком и животноводство. Он не упускает возможности заработать дополнительные финансы. 
Хайдар берет кредит для закупа овец.
texts.en:
Haydar lives in Isfara. He is 28 years old, married, and has one child. His wife is a homemaker.

Haydar has been raising sheep and goats for 12 years. Five years ago, he began working as an electrician and has been balancing this job with his animal husbandry.

Haydar never passes up an opportunity to become more financially secure. He is now seeking a loan in order to purchase sheep.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Fonofili

texts.en: Fonofili is 44 years old and married with five children. She runs a small business selling chopsuey, chicken curry, steamed rice, and bbq in her community and has been doing this for two years. Fonifili has requested a loan to purchase more chickens, bags of rice, onions, curry powder, soya, and a new gas oven. She joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Fonofili will improve her business and help her kids with their education.

loans.use: to purchase chickens, soya, salt, and a new gas oven.

loans.name: Valaauina

texts.en: Valaauina is a 36-year-old married woman with three children. She has a small plantation and grows caprioka, taro, taamu, and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this for two years. Valaauina has requested a loan to buy weed killer, weed spray, spades, fertilizers, more baby taros, and a mist blower. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits, Valaauina hopes to improve her business and help her family and her kids with their education.

loans.use: to buy weed killer, spades, weed spray, fertilizer,..

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is 35 years old and lives in Taguig, the Philippines. Her husband is a vendor, and they have three children. She earns a living by buying and selling clothing, and gets her inventory from wholesalers and sells it on a retail basis to both men and women. Her customers like her low prices and wide inventory. Most of the people who buy her clothing are her neighbors, and she earns a minimum of PHP 300 in sales every day.

To continue operating her business, she is requesting a loan for PHP 50,000. She will use the loan to buy more items to sell to her customers and to expand her inventory. By boosting her business, she expects this loan to increase her income. In coming years, she hopes to expand her business and draw her family closer to God. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from her religion.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 people who gather weekly to study religion, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy more clothing to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Mareta

texts.en: Mareta is a 30-year-old married woman with three children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, bananas, and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this for one year. Mareta has requested a loan to buy fertilizers, weed killer, weed spray, bush knives, a wheel barrow, pair axes, and a chain saw. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits, Mareta hopes to improve her business and help her kids with their education.

loans.use: to buy weed killer, a wheel barrow, shovels, pair axes, and bush knives.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine has lived in the Mukuru informal settlement of Nairobi for ten years, where she and her husband, a contract worker, have started a family. Her four children--two boys and two girls--are the primary reason Josphine wants a Fresh Life Toilet: she dreams of being able to pay for their school fees through secondary school. Her first-born is currently in standard 5. 

Running a business is not new to Josephine; she owns a small shop and is also a trained tailor, specializing in embroidered tablecloth. Josephine manages her family’s affairs with the money she gets from her businesses. Once her children are through school, Josephine’s hope is that her Fresh Life toilet will bring in enough profits for her to expand her business ventures to commercial vehicles.

loans.use: To purchase and run two Fresh Life Toilets.

loans.name: L’Eternel Est Mon Berger 2 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe L’ETERNEL EST MON BERGER 2 est composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies appartenant à un même groupe de tontine. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Akouèmahou Pélagie est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Akouèmahou Pélagie est âgée de 35 ans et est mariée à un certain Clément. Le couple a quatre enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Akouèmahou Pélagie n’a pas fréquenté l’école.  Akouèmahou Pélagie vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Akouèmahou Pélagie assure ensemble avec son mari, les divers besoins du ménage. Pour assurer ses différentes charges, Akouèmahou Pélagie mène comme activité la coiffure dans son atelier. De façon secondaire, Akouèmahou Pélagie vend des mèches, des produits de cheveux, des tissus et des cartes de recharge. Akouèmahou Pélagie exerce cette activité depuis neuf ans. Akouèmahou Pélagie s’approvisionne dans sa région et dans une ville du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu, Akouèmahou Pélagie sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe L’ETERNEL EST MON BERGER 2, un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Ce prêt leur servira à rehausser le stock de ses produits et à augmenter leur clientèle. Les trois premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group L’ETERNEL EST MON BERGER 2 consists of three people who are friends and belong to the same tontine group. The representative of the group, by the name of Akouèmahou Pélagie is the one who has her hand raised on the photo. Akouèmahou Pélagie is 35 years old and is married to a certain Clément. The couple has four children all in school and under their care. Akouèmahou Pélagie did not go to school. Akouèmahou Pélagie lives together with her children and her husband. Akouèmahou Pélagie takes care of the diverse needs of the household together with her husband. 

To take care of her different responsibilities, Akouèmahou Pélagie manages a hairdressing business in her workshop. On the side, Akouèmahou Pélagie sells hair extensions, hair products, fabric and mobile phone recharge cards. Akouèmahou Pélagie has been practicing this business for nine years. Akouèmahou Pélagie gets her supplies in her region and in a town in Bénin. 

In seeking to satisfy her clientèle and to grow her sales and her income, Akouèmahou Pélagie is requesting, together with the other members of the L'ETERNEL EST MON BERGER 2 group, a fourth loan from ALIDé. This loan will be used to replenish the stock of their products and to increase their clientèle. The first three loans were well repaid.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions, hair products, fabric and mobile phone recharge cards.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase and run a Fresh Life Toilet.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy parasols, blouses and other products to sell

loans.name: Catarino

texts.es: Catarino es un hombre muy alegre y positivo que a sus 65 años de edad, sigue trabajando muy duro por contar con una vida mejor, vive junto a su compañera de vida quien se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar. Catarino posee un negocio que está ubicado en el mercado central de su lugar de residencia, donde comercializa productos de primera necesidad como: pastas de zapatos, pegamentos, lazos, papel higiénico, bolsas plásticas y otros más. Catarino trabaja de lunes a domingo con el fin de poder vender más. Él solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de más productos de primera necesidad y de esta forma aumentar sus ventas lo cual es lo principal para Catarino ya que es la única fuente de ingresos con la que cuenta.
texts.en:
Catarino is a very happy and positive man of 65 years of age.  He has been working very hard for a better life.  He lives with his life partner, who works as a homemaker.  Catarino owns a business that is located in the central market of his place of residence, where he sells staple goods like: soles for shoes, adhesives, ties, toilet paper, plastic bags and much more.

Catarino works from Monday to Sunday in order to be able to sell more.  He asks for this loan with which he can have the necessary money to invest in the purchase of more staple goods.  In this way he can increase his sales, which for Catarino is the only source of income that he can count on.

loans.use: to buy staple goods to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy planks of wood, varnish, and upholstery materials to make furniture.

loans.name: Mahoromeza Group

texts.fr:
Anatolie fait partie du groupe Mahoromeza .C'est un groupe de 5 femmes,mais Domithile est malade.Sur la photo, elle est représentée par son mari Symphorien .
Anatolie  habite à Cibitoke. Elle a 40 ans et est mariée à Patrice, un cultivateur. Ensemble ils ont  7enfants, âgés de  9 à 28 ans, dont  4 étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de  la bière de banane depuis  3ans. 

Elle est à son onzième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle va  augmenter son capital qui va avoir un double emploi :une partie  va servir à acheter de bananes pour préparer  de la bière de banane, une autre,  à acheter  de l’huile de palme ,  à revendre pour  gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines années, elle voudrait voir ses enfants étudier et vivre aisément.
texts.en:
Anatolie is a member of the Mahoromeza group and lives in Cibitoke. This is a group of five women, but Domithile is sick. In the picture, she is represented by her husband Symphorien.

Anatolie is 40 years old and married to Patrice, a farmer. Together they have 7 children, ages from 9 to 28, of whom 4 attend school.

Anatolie has been in the beer business for 3 years. This is her eleventh loan with Turame. With the Kiva loan proceeds, she will increase her business capital which will serve two purposes: first, to purchase bananas in order to prepare banana beer, and second, to purchase palm oil to resell and increase her income.

In the coming years, Anatolie would like to see her children receive an education and to lead easy lives.

loans.use: to increase her business capital for two purposes: first, to purchase bananas to prepare banana beer, and second, to purchase palm oil, in order to resell it and increase profits

loans.name: Helene Alice

texts.fr: Helene est une femme de 35 ans, célibataire, et mére de 2 enfants dont les l'ages sont 6 et 4 ans tous sont scolarisés. Elle est commerçante dans un quartier de la capitale oû elle tient un un salon de coiffure depuis 2 ans dejà. Son acceil chaleureux, son savoir faire et surtout la qualité de ses prix lui ont fait croître sa clientéle qu'elle n'arrive plus à satisfaire à cause de la rupture permanente de ses stocks. Elle voudrait donc ce credit pour pouvoir augmenter ses stocks(acheter les méches, les greffes...), elle esper avec cela fidélier sa clientéle enfin d'augmenter ses bénéfices. avec lesquels elle voudrait agrandir sa structure et voir si elle pourrait recruter des employés
texts.en:
Helene is a 35-year-old woman, single, and the mother of two children, ages 6 and 4.  Both her children attend school.

For the past two years, she has run a small business - a hairdressing salon - in one of the neighborhoods of the capital city.

Thanks to her warm welcome, to her expertise, and to the low prices of her services, she has managed to attract an increasingly large number of customers.  However, she is currently having a hard time meeting their needs since she is constantly out-of-stock.

This is why she is requesting this loan, in order to increase her stock of goods (hair extensions, weaves...).  She hopes that this loan will help her to rebuild some customer loyalty and to boost her profits.  She plans to use her profits to expand her business and maybe hire some employees.

loans.use: to buy hair products: extensions, weaves, oil...

loans.name: Ana María Del Carmen

texts.es: Ana María de 61 años de edad, vive junto a su padre, su esposo y un hijo, ella es una mujer muy dedicada a su familia que vela por el bienestar y sostenimiento de su familia junto a su esposo. Ana posee una tienda en la cual vende granos básicos, sopas instantáneas, pan, café, leche y otros productos más los cuales son para el consumo diario y así mismo para el uso diario del hogar.  Ella solicita un crédito a INTEGRAL  para poder comprar mayor cantidad de productos perecederos para la tienda y así mismo introducir productos nuevos que las personas solicitan. De esta manera ella espera poder ver el crecimiento de su negocio, y así contar con un negocio más estable el cual le brinde la tranquilidad que Ana desea para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Ana María, 61, lives with her father, her husband and one son. She is a woman who is very dedicated to her family and who ensures the well-being and sustenance of her family together with her husband. 

Ana has a store from which she sells basic grains, instant soups, bread, coffee, milk and other products used for daily consumption as well as for daily use in the home. She is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to be able to buy a larger quantity of perishable goods for the store and, additionally, to introduce new products that people request. 

In this manner, she hopes to be able to see the growth of her business and rely on a more stable business that offers her the tranquility she desires for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy milk, coffee, bread and other products to stock up the store with

loans.name: Shamsibonu

texts.ru:
Шамсибону жительница города Исфара. Ей 57 лет. Она замужем. У нее единственный сын. Сын Шамсибону работает таксистом. 
Шамсибону три года как занимается животноводством. Она в основном занимается купле – продажей овец. В этой области она три года. Шамсибону просит кредит для закупа мелко - рогатого скота и корма.
texts.en: Shamsibonu is a resident of the city of Isfara.  She is 57 years old, married and has one son.  Her son works as a taxi driver.  Shamsibonu has been involved in animal husbandry for three years.  She primarily buys and sells sheep.  Shamsibonu is requesting this loan to purchase small livestock and feed.

loans.use: to purchase small livestock and feed

loans.name: Uped Group

texts.fr: Il s’appelle Kokou et est cultivateur de la région centrale du Togo. Marié à une ménagère, Kokou est le président du groupe de solidarité UPED localisé dans la même région. Il est âgé de 42 ans et est père de famille de deux enfants scolarisés dont l’ainé est âgé de sept ans et le benjamin de quatre ans. Il exerce son activité depuis 2008 et se fait aider par cinq employés. Dans le but d’acheter d'acheter des outils de travail pour avoir un bon rendement, cet ancien client de WAGES sollicite le soutien financier de ce dernier pour y arriver. Ainsi avec les revenus futurs de la culture du maïs, Kokou compte augmenter sa superficie cultivable et assurer un bien être sans faille à sa famille. Les autres membres du groupe font également la culture du maïs.
texts.en:
This is Kokou, a farmer in the central region of Togo.  Married to a homemaker, Kokou is the president of the solidarity group UPED, located in the same region.  

Kokou is 42 years old and the father of two children, ages 7 and 4, who both attend school.  He has been involved in his business since 2008 and has five employees working for him.

Having already received support from WAGES in the past, Kokou is once more requesting financial assistance from this organization in order to buy working tools to increase his productivity.

With the earnings that he will get from his maize farming business, Kokou will increase the surface area of his arable land and definitely ensure the well-being of his family.

The other members of the group are also growing maize.

loans.use: to buy working tools.

loans.name: Nyenepock

texts.en:
Nyenepock is married and has seven children, with three below the age of 15. The family lives in a two-room apartment house in Bamenda, northwest region of Cameroon. This woman has faced many challenges in life, such as the death of the mother, the death of the only brother, and the death of the father-in-law. Also, the problem of inadequate capital to run a business, no means to provide good medical care for her children, and proper education.  However, with this loan she intends to use it to buy fish in bulk, also to buy all the ingredients that are needed in the fish roasting activity, part of the loan will be used to purchase the things that are use in a white stuff bar, and the rest of the loan will be used to invest in the call box business. 

Nyenepock believes her activities will succeed because of the increase in the demand of roasted fish in the community and the high demand for white stuff in many occasions, like traditional celebrations and marriages. Also she has been in the business of call boxes for a long time. This business will help the community in that it will improve the quality of white stuff the community will drink, customers will also not go long distances to buy roasted fish, and to call their love ones. The gain from this business will help her to expand her business. Also, the profit will be used to buy the children's school needs and to pay for the children's school fees. The profit will generally increase the living standard of her family.

loans.use: to buy fresh fish, palm wine and to operate a call box.

loans.name: Vevencia

texts.en:
Vevencia is 46 years old and married with three children. 

Vevencia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell in her store, such as shampoo and groceries.

Vevencia has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns income from raising livestock.

Vevencia aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her store

loans.name: Avelina

texts.en:
Avelina is 45 years old and married with two children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Avelina has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines. Avelina has requested a 20,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase spare parts for her business.

Avelina has been in this business for 26 years. In the future, Avelina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for her motorcycle transport business

loans.name: Khawla

texts.en:
Khawla is 44 years old woman and the mother of three sons. Her husband is a construction worker who earns a low salary, not enough to cover the family's needs. For the past 8 years, Khawla has been raising and selling sheep and sheep products, which has been a profitable project, but also needs more support to cover the family's needs.

Khawla is requesting a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing more sheep and improving the herd's condition. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

Khawla is photographed in the herd next to the sheep.

loans.use: To purchase more sheep and improve the herd's condition

loans.name: Guilvena

texts.en:
Guilvena is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines. She works hard to support her family. Guilvena has been in this business for three years now.

Guilvena has requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase materials for the repair of her pump boat.

In the future, Guilvena would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase materials for the repair of her pump boat

loans.name: Adalberto De Jesús

texts.es: Adalberto de Jesús de 36 años de edad, trabaja como mecánico en su propio taller el cual está ubicado en una zona muy comercial lo cual es de mucha beneficio para él. Adalberto vive junto a su esposa quien se dedica a los  quehaceres del hogar y junto a una hija. Él es muy honesto y trabajador, razón por la que cuenta con varios clientes fijos que confían mucho en el trabajo que Adalberto realiza. Con el deseo de poder mejorar la condiciones de su hogar solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario no solo para invertir un poco en su negocio sino también para finalizar la construcción de una habitación, la cual por falta de ingresos solo inicio y que ahora desea terminar.
texts.en:
Adalberto de Jesús, 36, works as a mechanic in his own repair shop located in a very commercial zone which is of great benefit to him.  Adalberto lives with his wife who does housework and with their daughter.  He is very honest and hardworking which is why he has several regular customers who trust the work Adalberto does very much.  

He wants to do some home improvements so is requesting a loan to have the money needed not only to invest in his business but also to finish building a room that due to lack of funds he was only able to start and now he’d like to finish.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
Mohamed is 33 years old and married. He sells food items to earn a living. He has his own shop and sells high-quality food items such as bread, sodas and flour to his customers. He has been in the business for seven months. He has additional income from his wages. His wife helps him with business.

Inventory has gone down so he wants to increase it. However, he does not have enough capital to buy more merchandise. He is requesting a loan from Yehu to buy bales of flour and a sack of sugar.

He dreams of expanding his business and becoming prosperous in the future.

loans.use: to buy bales of flour and a sack of sugar.

loans.name: Jenalyn

texts.en:
Jenalyn is 31 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Jenalyn runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 16 years and sells a variety of items, such as sugar, coffee, milk, soap, and canned goods. Jenalyn has requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell. 

In the future Jenalyn would like to save enough to provide financial stability for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase chemical fertiliser and to pay for labour.

loans.name: Susana Del Carmen

texts.es: Susana del Carmen de cuarenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo en casa propia. Ella posee un pequeño taller de costura, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite elaborar las mejores prendas, tiene mucha clientela confecciona faldas y trajes para vender en diferentes pueblos, todo es producido con material de primera calidad, a precios accesibles pero sobre todo con un buen servicio; Susana es una mujer activa y muy luchadora siempre esta buscando la mejor alternativa que le ayude a encontrar el camino al éxito, día con día pone toda si dedicación para que sus trabajo de frutos, aumento la demanda en su negocio y quiere realizar una nueva inversión en materia prima por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela por mayor. Susana del Carmen tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, se hace responsable de cancelar la deuda y al mismo tiempo tiene confianza que podrá ofrecerle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Susana del Carmen, 44, lives with her life companion and their son in her own house.  She owns a small sewing workshop and has been in business several years; this has given her much experience which allows her to make better items.  She has many customers and makes skirts and outfits to sell in different towns.  Everything is made with top quality material, her prices are affordable and above all her service is good.  Susana is a very active, hardworking woman who is always looking for the best way to find success.  Day to day she puts her effort into making her work bear fruit.  

Demand has increased and she wants to make a new investment in raw materials which is why she’s asking Integral for a loan to buy fabric at wholesale.  Susana del Carmen has good payment references and impeccable morals.  She commits to repay the loan while at the same time trusts that she will be able to provide her family with a fulfilled life.

loans.use: to buy fabric at wholesale.

loans.name: Nune

texts.ru:
Нуне стала вдовой 14 лет назад и с тех пор она одна воспитывает двоих детей: сына и дочь. Сын Нуне учится на 3-ем курсе Ереванского Государственного экономического университета на факультете международных экономических отношений; дочь Нуне учится в том же университете на 1-ом курсе факультета маркетинга. Оба учатся на платных отделениях. 
Сама Нуне окончила Ереванский педагогический университет, и по специальности она учительница русского языка и литературы. Но в данный момент Нуне работает секретаршей в Сюникской региональной администрации. 
Нуне необходим кредит в размере 200.000 драм для оплаты обучения сына во втором семестре.
texts.en: Nune became a widow 14 years ago and has been raising two children: a son and a daughter since then.  Her son is a third-year international economics relations student at the Yerevan State Economics University, and her daughter is a first-year marketing student at the same university.  Both attend paid divisions.  Nune graduated from the Yerevan Pedagogical University and is a Russian language and literature teacher, but currently Nune works as a secretary at the Syunik regional administration office.  Nune needs a loan in the amount of 200,000 dram to pay for her son's second semester education.

loans.use: to pay for her son's second semester university education

loans.name: Juana Dina

texts.es: Juana Dina de 64 años de edad, es una mujer muy trabajadora quien lucho por salir adelante junto a su hija ya que perdió a su esposo hace muchos años atrás, actualmente vive con su hija y una amiga con las cuales comparte los gastos del hogar. Juana trabaja vendiendo sandalias para hombres y mujeres y también ropa interior femenina, las cuales comercializa de forma ambulante por diferentes departamentos del país, ella trabaja de lunes a sábado, y cada mañana sale de su hogar con la esperanza de vender todos sus productos. Juana solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor variedad de sandalias, diferentes estilos y colores y también mayor cantidad de ropa interior, con esto ella espera aumentar sus ventas y así poder vivir mejor.
texts.en:
Juana Dina, 64, is a very hardworking woman who struggled to get ahead with her daughter since she lost her husband many years ago.  She currently lives with her daughter and a girlfriend; they all share household expenses.  

Juana works selling sandals for men and women and also women’s underwear from place to place in various departments in the country.  She works Monday through Saturday and she leaves home every morning with the hope of selling all her products.  

Juana is asking Integral for a loan to buy a wider selection of sandals in various styles and colors and also a larger amount of underwear.  With this she hopes to increase sales and thus to live better.

loans.use: to buy sandals and underwear to resell.

loans.name: Elida Del Carmen

texts.es: Elida Del Carmen, se dedica a realizar diferentes actividades para poder vivir mejor, ella reside junto a su esposo, su madre de edad muy avanzada y dos hijos menores de edad. Elida posee una venta de productos de belleza y cosméticos como: cremas, perfumes labiales y otros más; así también trabaja como empleada doméstica, ambos trabajos son muy importantes para ella, debido a que le permiten percibir más ganancias. Elida solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar más cantidad de productos de belleza ya que su negocio es bastante estable, por lo que desea mejorar las condiciones de este y poder obtener más ganancias. Elida es muy trabajadora y cuenta con el gran deseo de esforzarse siempre para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Elida Del Carmen works in a variety of activities in order to live better.  She lives with her husband, her elderly mother and two minor children.  Elida sells beauty products and cosmetics like creams, perfume, lipstick and other.  She also works as a domestic employee.  Both jobs are very important for her because they allow her to earn higher profits.

Elida is asking Integral for a loan to buy larger amounts of beauty products because her business is quite stable and she wants to improve its conditions to earn more profits.  Elida is very hardworking and has a strong drive for self-improvement in order to move ahead.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to resell.

loans.name: Dinora Esmeralda

texts.es: Dinora de 48 años de edad vive junto a su esposo y un hijo menor de edad, ella es una mujer muy responsable quien trabaja muy duro para poder darle la mejor vida posible a su hijo. Dinora  posee una tortillería la cual está ubicada en su casa de habitación, en la cual se encarga de elaborar tortillas todos los días de la semana en cada mediodía. Dinora solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar maíz por mayor para comprarlo a precio más bajo y de esta manera contar con más cantidad de materia prima para elaborar más tortillas. Ella es una señora muy amable y alegre quien siempre se ha esforzado por salir adelante y contar con todo lo necesario para su familia.
texts.en: Dinora, 48, lives with her husband and minor son.  She’s a very responsible woman who works hard to provide her son with the best life possible.  Dinora has a tortilla shop located at home.  She makes tortillas every day at noon.  Dinora is asking for a loan to buy corn at wholesale so that she can get it for a lower price and have more raw materials available to make tortillas.  She is a very kind, cheerful lady who is always striving to get ahead and provide everything necessary for her family.

loans.use: to buy corn to make tortillas.

loans.name: Bahodir

texts.ru: Баходиру 18 лет. Он очень трудолюбивый и целеустремленный парень. В школе он учился отлично. С детства он мечтал получить высшее образование и стать хорошим специалистом. Условия жизни у них были очень тяжелые.  Он окончил школу в этом году и поступил в университет, но зарплата его родителей не хватает для оплаты учебы. Он запрашивает кредит для оплаты учебы. Он очень надеется на вашу доброту!
texts.en: Bahodir is 18 years old.  He is a very hardworking and goal-oriented young man.  He was an excellent student at school.  Since childhood, he dreamed of obtaining a higher education and becoming a good specialist.  Their life conditions were hard.  He graduated from school this year and was accepted to a university, but his parents' salary is not enough to pay for the education.  Bahodir is requesting this loan to pay for his education.  He relies on your kindness very much!

loans.use: to pay for his university education

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Judith works hard to support her family. She has a banana-selling business in the Philippines, and also earns income from raising pigs and operating a general store.

Judith, who has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF, is now borrowing PHP 30000 through NWTF to buy more bananas to sell. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy more bananas to sell

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
